snippet: Market declines eased after minutes from the Federal Reserve’s January meeting showed that policy makers did not appear ready to raise interest rates.
abstract: Stock market declines slightly in wake of release of account of Federal Reserve's January policy-making meeting.
lead_paragraph: Market declines eased after minutes from the Federal Reserve’s January meeting showed that policy makers did not appear ready to raise interest rates.

headline.main: Modest Loss for Market After Fed Minutes Are Released
headline.print_headline: Shares Mixed, Showing Minor Effect From Fed News
